meanings.definition: Based on personal opinions or feelings rather than facts.
meanings.sent1: She gave a subjectively positive review of the movie.
meanings.sent2: The artist's work is subjectively beautiful to different people.
meanings.sent3: He subjectively believes that pizza is the best food in the world.
meanings.sent4: Her subjectively colorful painting captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The subjectively warm weather made everyone happy.

meanings.definition: In a way that is influenced by personal beliefs or perspectives.
meanings.sent1: He subjectively interpreted the data to support his theory.
meanings.sent2: She subjectively views the situation from a different angle.
meanings.sent3: The cat subjectively decided to nap in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The music subjectively transported her to another time.
meanings.sent5: The subjectively bright colors of the sunset painted the sky.
